about_the_game:
ENZBOTS 2 player split screen fun.
Easy to play, hard to master, massively re-playable.
A good product at a good price, will put you in a good mode.
ENZBOTS is everything i have, all my heart and sole went into creating ENZBOTS
Created by one person over 3 years, my first game, first of many if all goes well.
You'll be needing a friend to help you through this game, it can be completed one player but its hard work.
ENZBOTS will test your skills, get the heart rate up, make you smile, and may show your true gaming ability.
Ian Gumby Mitchell, the creator, has seen the evolution of games from coin slots to on line and been amazed at the changes.
"ENZBOTS is an attempt to return to the old ways of gaming, where skill of mastery made the difference...
Drawing from memory of the past I pooled my best times together in the most economical way i could think of.
Planned for ten years, 3 years to make (ever day, like every day) Learning new software along the way."
From beginners to experts this game has challenged all, simple controls for the beginner, leads to a handful for the well practiced.
"I have played this game thousands of times while testing and building, and never have i found it boring or predictable.
Random events being the main focus of the project, so that no two game plays are the same."

name: ENZBOTS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Mid range card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Just need a mid range computer and two controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Split screen, co-op, easy to play, hard to master. Enzbots is hours of re-playable fun, for any age or skill. (Girlfriend friendly) Fight your way through pool, soccer, mini golf and much more.
